```{r}

library(tidyverse)

storms %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = hurricane_force_diameter, y = pressure)) +
  xlab("Diameter of Area With Hurricane Strength Winds (Nautical Miles)") +
  ylab("Air Pressure at Storm Center (Knots)")
  

```
